title: Loving Hut
description: Part of the international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of supreme master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Individually family operated. This location opened Jan 2016 and is by the Kitay-Gorod metro station, on the 3rd floor of Галерея Арго (Gallery Argo). Menu is western & international and health-oriented. Open kitchen and eco-interior.
